snippet.title: The Hero We Need - Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist today https://store.steampowered.com/app/1584820/The_Hero_We_Need/

Tower defense with RTS elements and a focus on narrative, where players create their own towers by crafting and combining runes.

Join us on Discord and help shape THWN https://discord.gg/NcHdGM6J3v
Follow on Twitter https://twitter.com/HeroWeNeedGame 
Reddit https://www.reddit.com/r/theheroweneed/
